DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate Brazilian fruit peel affect acute/postprandial glucose insulin response , inflammatory marker , appetite control peptide , antioxidative capacity , well subjective appetite rating ( VAS-visual analogue scale ) healthy volunteer . We hypothesize certain Brazilian fruit peel add standardized meal improve postprandial glucose tolerance metabolic biomarkers healthy volunteer , compare similar meal without correspond plant material .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Brazilian Fruits Peel Metabolic Regulation Appetite Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Signed informed consent BMI 20 28 kg/m2 weight change < 3 kg late 2 month Must able accept plantbased foods/drinks Below 18 year Uncomfortable speak English and/or difficulty understand spoken English Smoking use snuff Vegetarian vegan Stressed venous blood sample previous experience difficult cannulate Receiving drug treatment may influence study outcomes Pregnancy breastfeed
